infos.value: Well... How should we proceed?
How else? We pursue Dorando and Gargas.
Now is the perfect opportunity to take them down.
...Hmm.
But first of all, why did you turn a blind eye when you had them within reach?
Within reach...?
Do not feign ignorance. They were visiting some boy in the village, were they not?
Have you no foresight? If we had ambushed them then and there—
Harm would befall the village? Is that what you wish to say?
Is that...a bad thing?
How naive...
And what do you know? Nitpicking at Brother's plans—
So this is the red mage who commands Hourne's second division, «Nitor»...
I've been wondering what kind of person you are, but to think you're this soft...
You're going too far, Kitone.
War means sacrifice. You would do well to bear that in mind...
You seem to be misunderstanding something.
Hm?
Shall I teach you why they call me the Vermilion Devil?
I always complete my mission—no matter how difficult—and I always return home.
I do not shy away from making sacrifices if they are necessary to see the mission through.
...Even if it means cutting down my allies.
However, this time I held back because you two and Salire were there.
Th-then...
If we end Dorando and Gargas here, we won't be able to utilize that village boy to our advantage.
You saw for yourself how they doted on the child.
If we take him as our hostage, we could control their every move.
S-stop talking like that, Brother. This joke isn't funny...
Heh heh heh. A joke, you say?
Yes, it was but a joke. She said I was soft, so I...
Kitone. If you desire to pursue them so badly, shall we?
My desire is...to fell them.
Very well.
Then let us move out.
If I remember correctly, we last saw them in this direction...
